title: Azure Deployment Stack manifest
description: Schema describing the YAML manifest files consumed by stack_orchestrator.py.

extends.description: Optional path or list of paths to other manifest files to merge prior to evaluation.

subscription.description: Whether to deploy at subscription scope (default true).

resourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group when deploying at resource-group scope.

location.description: Azure location used to create the deployment stack record.

template.description: Bicep file and parameters used for the stack deployment.

file.description: Path to the Bicep or ARM template file relative to the manifest.

parameters.description: Optional path to a bicepparam/JSON parameter file relative to the manifest.

extraAzArgs.description: Additional arguments appended to the az stack sub create command.

dependencies.description: Optional list of dependency stacks that must be deployed first.

name.description: Alias used when referencing the dependency's outputs. Defaults to stackName.

stackName.description: Name of the dependent deployment stack.

outputs.description: Optional mapping that names the dependency outputs you plan to reference (for documentation or parameterBindings).

exports.description: Outputs from this stack that will be cached and made available to dependants.

parameterBindings.description: Parameter overrides sourced from dependency outputs using <alias>.<output> syntax.
